content: Amphenol Corp   a maker of electronic and fiber optic connectors  said it made a binding offer to acquire Singapore-based electronic connectors maker FCI Asia Pte Ltd for $1.28 billion to strengthen its telecom products business.
name: Amphenol Corporation
title: Amphenol Corp offers to buy FCI Asia for $1.28 billion

content: June 29 Amphenol Corp  a maker of electronic and fiber optic connectors  said it made a binding offer to acquire Singapore-based electronic connectors maker FCI Asia Pte Ltd for $1.28 billion to strengthen its telecom products business.
name: Amphenol Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Amphenol Corp offers to buy FCI Asia for $1.28 bln

content: June 29 Amphenol Corp  a maker of fiber optic cables and related devices  said it had made a binding offer to acquire Singaporean electronic connectors maker FCI Asia Pte Ltd for $1.28 billion.
name: Amphenol Corporation
title: Amphenol Corp offers to buy FCI Asia for $1.28 bln
